reviews.text: I returned from a stay at this hotel after a brief stop over on business. I have to first start of the review by commenting on the obvious: it's Dayton, OH, - is just not that great of a place to be in the first place. With that said, this hotel was clean, convenient and the staff was friendly. It offers a free shuttle to and from the airport, which was very helpful. In addition, it includes breakfast which is available from 4:00 a.m. This is helpful for anyone with an early morning flight (apparenlty, many of the pilots stay over there). The shuttle starts running at 5:00 a.m.
reviews.title: Decent For the Price
Renovation nightmare!
reviews.text: FOOD - it is actually very convenient to a number of places to eat -since I didn't have a car, it was helpful to walk right across the way to some decent food.
All in all, it was a decent hotel for the price. Would I vacation there? No. Would I stay there again if I have to go to Dayton? Sure!
reviews.title: Good location-weird smells
